cab.content: nwimr -......3.Military Secret.This Document is the Property ofHi3 Britannic Majesty's Government.12511/^^^^I 440 ' )coWrom Viceroy, Army Department, to Secretary of State for India^ ^A%y ' 10th January 1920.12?ALL G^.?^ (Received 11th.)345. 10th January. Malleson wires 8th. January, repeating para. 2 toTeheran: " 1. Report from Chardjui 23rd December, states fresh Red troops estimated at,000 to 8,000 with 25 armoured cars passed through westward during last fortnight." 2. According to several arrivals from Askabad (corrupt group) Austrianprisoners of war, the Bolshevics talk freely of crossing the Caspian Sea as soon asKrasnovodsk is more or less in their hands with the object of taking Denikin inthe rear."tilt
